description: Bridges: Method `saveRefund()` must have `public function [update|create]<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionRequestTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `calculateRefund()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
